poses.pose_description: Balance on the sitting bones with legs lifted, forming a V-shape with the body. Arms parallel to the ground or reaching toward the feet.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens core muscles, improves balance and digestion, stimulates kidneys, thyroid and prostate glands, helps relieve stress.

poses.translation_name: ardha = half, nava = boat, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Similar to Boat Pose but with bent knees, shins parallel to the ground, forming a less intense V-shape.
poses.pose_benefits: Builds core strength, improves balance and concentration, helps relieve stress, gentler on the lower back.

poses.pose_description: Hold body in straight line from head to heels, supported by hands and toes.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens core, arms, and wrists, improves posture and balance.

poses.pose_description: Lie on the belly, bend knees, reach back to hold ankles, lift chest and legs to form a bow shape.
poses.pose_benefits: Opens chest and shoulders, strengthens back muscles, improves posture and flexibility, stimulates digestive organs.

poses.translation_name: setu bandha = bridge lock, sarvanga = all limbs, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Lie on the back, bend knees, feet flat on the ground. Lift hips, rolling the spine off the floor, and clasp hands beneath the pelvis.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches spine and chest, strengthens back muscles, improves posture, can help relieve anxiety and fatigue.

poses.pose_description: Kneel with knees hip-width apart, reach back to hold heels, arch spine and lift chest toward ceiling.
poses.pose_benefits: Opens chest and shoulders, improves posture, stimulates digestive and endocrine systems, increases energy.

poses.translation_name: urdhva = upward, mukha = face, svana = dog, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Lie on belly, straighten arms to lift chest and hips off ground, thighs lifted.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens spine and arms, opens chest and lungs, improves posture.

poses.translation_name: urdhva = upward, dhanu = bow, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Lie on back, bend knees with feet flat on ground. Place hands by ears, fingers pointing toward shoulders. Press into hands and feet to lift entire body off the ground, arching into a backbend.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens arms, wrists, legs, buttocks, abs, and spine. Stretches chest and lungs. Increases energy and counteracts depression. Therapeutic for asthma, back pain, infertility, and osteoporosis.

poses.translation_name: baddha = bound, kona = angle, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Sitting with soles of feet together, knees bent out to sides, hands holding feet or ankles. Spine straight, gently press knees toward ground.
poses.pose_benefits: Opens hips and groin, improves flexibility in inner thighs, can help with menstruation and sciatica.

poses.translation_name: paschi = west, uttana = intense stretch, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Sit with legs extended, fold forward from hips, reaching for feet.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches entire back body, calms mind, improves digestion.

poses.pose_description: Sit cross-legged with each foot placed on opposite thigh.
poses.pose_benefits: Opens hips, calms mind, improves posture and concentration.

poses.translation_name: ardha = half, matsya = fish, indra = ruler, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Sit with one leg crossed, other foot outside opposite thigh. Twist toward raised knee.
poses.pose_benefits: Improves spine mobility, aids digestion, energizes body.

poses.pose_description: Start on hands and knees, round spine toward ceiling while dropping head and tailbone.
poses.pose_benefits: Improves spine flexibility, relieves back pain, calms mind, good for stress relief.

poses.pose_description: Start on hands and knees, arch back while lifting head and tailbone.
poses.pose_benefits: Improves posture and balance, coordinates breathing, calms mind, massages spine.

poses.pose_description: Stand with feet together, bend knees and sink hips as if sitting in a chair, arms raised overhead.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens thighs, calves, and ankles, stretches chest and shoulders, stimulates heart and diaphragm.

poses.pose_description: Step one foot forward into a lunge, back heel lifted. Raise arms overhead, back knee off the ground.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches hip flexors and quadriceps, strengthens legs, improves balance and stability.

poses.translation_name: ardha = half, pincha = feather, mayura = peacock, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Similar to Downward-Facing Dog but on forearms instead of hands. Elbows shoulder-width apart, forearms pressed into mat.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens shoulders and core, stretches spine and hamstrings, calms mind, good preparation for headstand.

poses.translation_name: adho = downward, mukha = face, svana = dog, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Form an inverted V-shape with the body, hands and feet pressing into the ground, hips lifted toward ceiling.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches entire back body, strengthens arms and legs, calms mind, relieves stress.

poses.translation_name: utthita = extended, hasta = hand, pada = foot, angusta = big toe, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Standing on one leg, hold big toe of other foot and extend leg forward. Can also be done to the side.
poses.pose_benefits: Improves balance and concentration, stretches hamstrings and calves, strengthens legs.

poses.translation_name: utthita = extended, parsva = side, kona = angle, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: From Warrior II, lower front arm to rest on thigh or floor, extend other arm over ear.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches sides of body, strengthens legs, improves stamina and concentration.

poses.translation_name: anjaneya = devotee of Lord Rama, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Step one foot forward between hands, lower back knee to ground. Can keep hands on ground or lift torso.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches hip flexors and quadriceps, strengthens legs, improves balance.

poses.translation_name: salamba = supported, bhujanga = cobra, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Lie on belly, prop upper body on forearms, legs extended behind.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens spine, opens chest and lungs, improves posture.

poses.pose_description: Extend legs in opposite directions until they form a straight line on the ground.
poses.pose_benefits: Increases flexibility in hips and hamstrings, improves balance.

poses.translation_name: ashta = eight, chandra = moon, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Stand with arms overhead, interlace fingers and stretch to one side.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches sides of body, improves flexibility, energizes body.

poses.translation_name: upavistha = seated, kona = angle, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Sit with legs extended out to sides as wide as possible.
poses.pose_benefits: Opens hips and groin, improves flexibility, builds strength.

poses.pose_description: From side plank, flip over by lifting hips and reaching top arm back to floor.
poses.pose_benefits: Opens chest and shoulders, strengthens arms and core, energizes body.

poses.pose_description: Kneel and sit back on heels, fold forward with arms extended or by sides, forehead resting on floor.
poses.pose_benefits: Gently stretches back, hips, and thighs, calms mind, relieves stress and fatigue.

poses.pose_description: Forward fold with hands clasped behind back, arms lifted away from body.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches hamstrings and spine, opens shoulders and chest, calms nervous system.

poses.translation_name: parsvottana = intense side stretch, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Stand with one foot forward, back foot at angle. Fold forward over front leg with straight spine.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches hamstrings and calves, improves balance, calms mind.

poses.pose_description: Lie flat on back with arms and legs extended, palms facing up, completely relaxed.
poses.pose_benefits: Calms central nervous system, promotes deep relaxation, reduces stress and anxiety, improves sleep.

poses.pose_description: Squat with hands planted on the ground, knees resting on upper arms. Shift weight forward until feet lift off ground.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens arms, wrists, and core, improves balance and focus, builds confidence.

poses.translation_name: pincha = feather, mayura = peacock, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Balance on forearms with legs extended up toward ceiling. Similar to handstand but on forearms.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens shoulders and core, improves balance and focus, builds confidence.

poses.translation_name: ardha = half, chandra = moon, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Balance on one hand and foot, other leg extended parallel to ground, top arm reaching to ceiling.
poses.pose_benefits: Improves balance and coordination, strengthens legs and core, opens hips and chest.

poses.translation_name: adho = downward, mukha = face, vrksa = tree, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Balance on hands with body inverted, legs straight up toward ceiling.
poses.pose_benefits: Builds upper body strength, improves balance and focus, increases confidence.

poses.pose_description: From plank, rotate onto one hand and edge of feet, lift other arm to ceiling.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens arms, wrists, and core, improves balance and focus.

poses.pose_description: Stand on one leg, other leg wrapped around standing leg. Arms wrapped in front of face.
poses.pose_benefits: Improves balance and focus, stretches shoulders and hips, strengthens legs.

poses.translation_name: viparita = reversed, virabhadra = warrior, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: From Warrior II, back bend while sliding back hand down leg, front arm reaching overhead.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches sides of body, strengthens legs, improves flexibility and balance.

poses.pose_description: Fold forward from hips with straight legs, bringing head toward shins.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches entire back body, calms nervous system, relieves stress.

poses.pose_description: Stand on one leg, other foot pressed into inner thigh or calf. Arms raised overhead like branches.
poses.pose_benefits: Improves balance and focus, strengthens legs and core, calms mind.

poses.translation_name: tri = three, kona = angle, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Stand with legs wide, front foot facing forward. Hinge at hip to reach front hand to shin, other arm to ceiling.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches legs, hips, and spine, strengthens core, improves balance.

poses.pose_description: Lunge with back foot at 45-degree angle, front knee bent. Arms raised overhead, chest facing forward.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens legs and core, opens hips and chest, improves focus and stability.

poses.pose_description: Lunge with back foot parallel to back edge of mat. Arms extended to sides, gaze over front hand.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens legs, opens hips and chest, improves concentration and stamina.

poses.pose_description: Balance on one leg, torso parallel to ground, back leg lifted. Arms can be in various positions.
poses.pose_benefits: Strengthens legs and core, improves balance and posture, builds focus.

poses.pose_description: From all fours, bring one knee forward behind wrist, extend back leg. Fold forward or stay upright.
poses.pose_benefits: Opens hip flexors and rotators, stretches thighs and groin, releases tension.

poses.translation_name: eka = one, pada = foot, raja = king, kapota = pigeon, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: From Pigeon pose, bend back knee and hold foot with hands, lifting chest toward ceiling.
poses.pose_benefits: Deep hip and back bend, opens chest and shoulders, improves flexibility.

poses.pose_description: Lower hips toward ground with feet flat, keeping spine straight.
poses.pose_benefits: Opens hips and groin, strengthens legs, improves digestion.

poses.pose_description: Lie on back, lift legs over head until toes touch floor behind head.
poses.pose_benefits: Stretches spine and shoulders, calms nervous system, helps with insomnia.

poses.translation_name: salamba = supported, sarvanga = all limbs, asana = pose
poses.pose_description: Lie on back, lift legs and torso, support back with hands, balance on shoulders.
poses.pose_benefits: Stimulates thyroid, improves circulation, calms nervous system.
